mapper.sql: id, course_name, course_description, category_id, teacher_id, current_price, course_cover, video_url, duration, course_status, sort_order, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT FROM course_info ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_info( course_name, course_description, category_id, teacher_id, current_price, course_cover, video_url, duration, course_status, sort_order, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{description}, #{categoryId}, #{teacherId}, #{price}, #{coverImage}, #{videoUrl}, #{duration}, #{status}, #{sort}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE course_info SET course_name = #{title}, course_description = #{description}, category_id = #{categoryId}, teacher_id = #{teacherId}, current_price = #{price}, course_cover = #{coverImage}, video_url = #{videoUrl}, duration = #{duration}, course_status = #{status}, sort_order = #{sort}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
